name: Crossy Granny
description:
Control your hero and protect Granny, who is in a hurry about her business. Take Granny as far as possible and you will become the master of the game Crossy Granny: Crazy Road.

Be careful - there are a lot of cars on the way. During the game, the intensity of traffic increases. Don't let Granny get under the wheels, otherwise you'll have to start all over again Earn power points by destroying everything around. Get gold coins and unlock new heroes. Move to new locations and immerse yourself in a different atmosphere of the game. Good luck!!!
